text:
This does not seem to be listed as an existing bug or RFE
Missing in 1.6.2 (my ant version) and plus (according to the online doc)

See doc some lines upper than http://ant.apache.org/manual/using.html#tasks

Current description:
"if" if the name of the property that must be set in order for this target to 
execute. 
"unless" unless the name of the property that must not be set in order for this 
target to execute 

basically I would like Ant to allow something like:
... if="condA,condB,condC"... (all the properties have to be set to execute)
... unless="condA,condB,condC"... (all the properties have to be NOT set to 
execute)

- The change would be backward compatible except if the properties include a 
comma which seems quite unlikely.
- This allows the code to be much simpler not needing to use the condition task
- comma separated values are usable in many other tasks
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2584 ***
